summary: A unit‑test suite that validates the behavior of a compressed‑sparse‑column matrix implementation, covering construction from dense data, copying, attribute access (data, indices, indptr, shape, dtype, ndim, nnz), element retrieval, conversion to dense arrays, string representation, pickling, and interoperability with SciPy sparse matrices.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the CSC matrix component in the library, providing regression protection and confidence for downstream applications that rely on sparse linear algebra.
